title: 痴撚線，今晚勁捉痴牆手足

replies.msg:
已知沙田、觀塘都有手足因為更新連儂牆被捕。即是以後，我們在連儂牆上看見的文宣，都是手足冒著極大的危險黏上的。我們再不能take for granted.

It is reported that some of us were caught for updating info on various Lennon Walls, including those in Shatin and Kwun Tong. That means from now on, behind every notice or art piece we see on the walls are people who are willing to risk themselves. We can no longer take them for granted.

可唔可以唔好剩係懲罰出名嘅黃店？
https://lih.kg/1675556

屌講乜撚嘢五大訴求

https://lih.kg/1676770

quote.msg:
已知沙田、觀塘都有手足因為更新連儂牆被捕。即是以後，我們在連儂牆上看見的文宣，都是手足冒著極大的危險黏上的。我們再不能take for granted.

It is reported that some of us were caught for updating info on various Lennon Walls, including those in Shatin and Kwun Tong. That means from now on, behind every notice or art piece we see on the walls are people who are willing to risk themselves. We can no longer take them for granted.

replies.msg:
每次5分鐘貼好就走
不宜久留
